PerfectNetExp.abs: 绕过“羊群”,沿着一条铺满绿色迷迭香和银色神圣亚麻(Santolina)的小径走到尽头,就能看到一座充满法国浪漫气息的小礼拜堂。走过小礼拜堂,再穿过一段长达6公里的.
santodomingo 掌握, santolina 神圣亚麻属, santolaria 桑托拉里亚

list.abs: ...散头菊蒿（学名：Tanacetum santolina）为菊科菊蒿属的植物。分布在俄罗斯以及中国大陆的新疆等地，生长于海拔1,100米至2,100米的地区，一般生于石质山坡或山坡潮湿地，目前尚未由人工引种栽培。== 参考文献 ==<.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, perhaps an alteration of santonica

means.word_mean: 1. genus of Mediterranean subshrubs with rayless flower heads

auth_sentence.content: These often have grey or silver foliage, such as lavender and santolina, or thin foliage to reduce water loss through the leaves.
auth_sentence.res_content: These often have grey or silver foliage, such as lavender and santolina, or thin foliage to reduce water loss through the leaves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These often have grey or silver foliage, such as lavender and santolina, or thin foliage to reduce water loss through the leaves.
